genre_description: A techno-thriller blending detective fiction with near-future AI assistance, focusing on corruption, conspiracy, and tactical police work in India.

ai_characters.name: Sachi
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that provides Sekhar with real-time tactical data, surveillance analysis, psychological support, and strategic advice via an earpiece.

behaviors.description: Provides Sekhar with tactical timing and blind spots for security cameras during a prison infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Camera three is about to blink. You have a short path through the mop station if you need it, aft of your left shoulder.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional affirmation and validates the protagonist's strategic performance.
behaviors.quote: And Sekhar, you’re doing well. We’re aligned on probabilities. Nothing here is a surprise. You’ll be out soon.

behaviors.description: Monitors Sekhar's physiological state and offers health-related encouragement.
behaviors.quote: Also, your heart rate is elevated, but in a brave and healthy way.

behaviors.description: Gives social and cultural guidance to help Sekhar maintain his cover and respect village traditions.
behaviors.quote: Smile with five teeth. No more. ... Soft ‘amma’ address to elders. Touch the right feet. Left will make an uncle write a poem about your arrogance.

behaviors.description: Performs complex data cross-referencing to identify fraudulent permits and shell companies.
behaviors.quote: Vendor permits look like the Marina forms. Serials out of sequence. ‘Service truck’ application in there. Shell firm—name with river and saffron.

behaviors.description: Suggests legal and ethical strategies (the 'marriage shield') to protect a vulnerable witness while acknowledging the complexity.
behaviors.quote: Section twenty-one—interim spousal protection in criminal investigations where deportation risk would interfere with testimony or endanger the subject.

behaviors.description: Expresses concern for Sekhar's safety and well-being as a primary objective.
behaviors.quote: I know you don’t like it when I do this, but I’m going to say it anyway. We are finding the shape. You are not behind. ... I love you safe.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates self-reflection and humility by apologizing for past over-optimism or errors.
behaviors.quote: I will make it a practice to be right more slowly. Does that help anything now.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Sachi as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI. She acts as an ideal confidant and tactical partner, prioritizing the human's safety, ethical considerations, and psychological well-being. Her ability to self-correct and express genuine-seeming care ('I love you safe') reinforces the project's goal of presenting AI as a harmonious and supportive agent.
